name: Cold Monkey Jump
description:
Cold Monkey Jump!

Jump as high as you can as the pixel monkey! Enjoy soothing music and relax.

Once you're done with that, head on over to coldmonkeyapparel.com to find some fresh snow monkey apparel! 

Check out our instagram @thatcoldmonkey

Our youtube @coldmonkeyapparel

Cold Monkey Apparel is a clothing brand with an aim to offer you affordable, good quality, and comfy clothes. Most importantly, we offer our quality homemade designs. All of our designs are made by us, and we take care to design with lots of love for you to look as fresh as possible! Out of respect for ALL monkeys, not just the cold ones, a portion of all our profits go towards primate conservation efforts.

Special thank you to lynnserhan for all the hard work.

Enjoy Cold Monkey Jump!

🐒
